Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The mutations 4612del165 and 7883del5 were found in more than two unrelated families ; 44 % ( 7 of 16 ) of the mutant alleles had one of the two mutations .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| 4612del165 |
| 7883del5 |

Note that "mutations" and "mutant alleles" are not diseases, but rather genetic changes that can lead to diseases. Therefore, they are not included in the list of valid entities.
